content:
Just to stay in concact after our rich discussions this lunch:
@Patrick Werner @Halina Labikova @May Terry @Oliver Krauss @May Terry

Thanks @Stefan Lang! Continuing the Montreal Thursday lunch followup.... thanks for meeting with Lloyd and BrianP regarding whether the notion of a Tumor Board should be a Procedure or Encounter FHIR resource - current position: Tumor Board activities are an Encounter. Sorry Stefan! :-) . Also, another fortuitous opportunity from Thursday lunch...additional interest from @Halina Labikova (Varian) and @Stefan Lang in participating in an mCODE FHIR Connectathon Track in Atlanta this September. We also have early support from Marty Madeira (AJCC) on using a cancer staging test set for prostate cancer curated from the AJCC API for Connectathon use cases. Next steps on Connectathon work - I will create a first draft of the actors, system roles, and use case scenarios for this track and advertise to the masses for participation in a couple of weeks. .... we have great interest and traction on doing this. Let's keep up the momentum! cc: @Mark Kramer

As I said, I agree, but not from the bottom of my heart :D
Anyway it's great to have these mind sharpening discussions!
I want to point to this discussion: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/tumor.20conference
